issue.title: [C++][Windows] Can't use GoogleTest installed by vcpkg
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16490](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16490). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is an issue where the vcpkg gtest version and the thridparty toolchain version differ and arrow is build with one and linked against the other. This is caused by logic introduced a long time ago to fix issues with conda. See also [here](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13063)
